name: Yin-Yang Ointment
description: Healing consumable that restores moderate health. Used in combat or exploration.

name: Toxic Powder
description: Poisonous substance that can be used to poison weapons or create toxic traps.

name: Oscillating Jade
description: Rare material with mysterious energy fluctuations. Used for crafting high-level gear.

name: Hemostatic Powder
description: Stops bleeding and accelerates wound healing quickly.

name: Kid's Fishing Rod
description: A simple fishing rod suitable for beginners. Can catch common fish.

name: Ebon Iron
description: Dark iron ore used in weapon crafting. Highly durable material.

name: Jade Pendant
description: Decorative pendant with spiritual properties. Increases luck slightly.

name: Gold Coin
description: Standard currency used in Where Winds Meet. Trade medium.

name: Silver Leaf
description: Rare plant material used in alchemy and medicine crafting.

name: Healing Potion
description: Standard potion that restores health gradually over time.

name: Greater Healing Potion
description: Powerful potion with enhanced healing effects.

name: Stamina Potion
description: Restores stamina for prolonged activities and combat.

name: Antidote
description: Counteracts poison effects and removes toxins from the body.

name: Torch
description: Light source for illuminating dark areas and caves.

name: Map
description: Quest item that reveals dungeon locations and secrets.

name: Iron Ore
description: Common ore used for basic weapon and armor crafting.

name: Copper Ore
description: Fundamental ore for beginner-level equipment creation.

name: Gold Ore
description: Premium ore that creates gleaming and valuable items.

name: Silk
description: Luxury fabric used for high-quality clothing and armor.

name: Leather
description: Animal hide used for durable armor and accessories.
